paragraph: Call now for FREE legal advice at (800) 568-8020

detailsData.title: Free Legal Advice
detailsData.content: The firm offers free initial consultations to help workers understand their employee rights before making decisions.

detailsData.title: No Win No Fees
detailsData.content: Qualified cases are accepted on a contingency fee basis, ensuring employees only pay if the firm wins money for them.

detailsData.title: Vast Experience
detailsData.content: With over 80 years of combined experience, the firm has a proven track record of helping employees fight unfair business practices.

companyName: Blumenthal Nordrehaug Bhowmik De Blouw LLP
subHeading: California Employment Lawyers, Labor Law Attorneys
valueProp: At Blumenthal Nordrehaug Bhowmik De Blouw LLP, our employment lawyers have the resources and experience companies fear in litigation. Our labor lawyers make sure that our clients get ALL of the wages they are owed when companies violate California labor laws.
CTA: Take action now and contact our labor lawyers for free legal advice about your rights at work.

testimonalData.text: Nick and his team represented our group against an employer - they were easy to communicate with, quick, and the outcome of the case was beyond what anyone was expecting!
testimonalData.author: Anonymous

testimonalData.text: My expectations were low for my case against a former employer, but Nicholas did a tremendous job answering all my questions and easing my doubts, and I felt confident that he'd get the job done.
testimonalData.author: Anonymous

testimonalData.text: Nick and his staff were awesome! I am very skeptical at first because of so many questions running through my mind, but every question I asked were given with the right and on point answer.
testimonalData.author: Anonymous
